languages.text: "Когда нас бросили умирать в схватке с {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, я решил, что довольно поел дерьма из кормушки Империума. Я забил до смерти нашего комиссара и убедил товарищей сдаться. Так я оказался здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Когда нас бросили умирать в схватке с {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, я решил, что довольно поел дерьма из кормушки Империума. Я забил до смерти нашего комиссара и убедил товарищей сдаться. Так я оказался здесь".

languages.text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."
languages.original_text: "Когда нас бросили умирать в схватке с {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, я решил, что довольно поел дерьма из кормушки Империума. Я забил до смерти нашего комиссара и убедил товарищей сдаться. Так я оказался здесь".

traits.locale_text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

"When they left us to die at the hands of Drukhari, I decided I'd eaten enough shit out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. That's how I ended up here. And you know what? I've never regretted it for a second."

"When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

"When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

"When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

languages.text: “后来，当那群人把我们丢在{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}的手中等死时，我意识到我已经受够了帝国的那堆臭狗屎。于是我打死了我们的政委，说服我的部队投降了。在那之后，我就来到了这个地方。”
languages.original_text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

traits.locale_text: “后来，当那群人把我们丢在{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}的手中等死时，我意识到我已经受够了帝国的那堆臭狗屎。于是我打死了我们的政委，说服我的部队投降了。在那之后，我就来到了这个地方。”

languages.text: 「我々が{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}に殺されるべく見捨てられた時、これ以上帝国の言いなりになるのはやめようと決意しました。コミッサーを死ぬまで殴打し、我が部隊に降参するように説得しました。その結果、ここに流れつきました」
languages.original_text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

traits.locale_text: 「我々が{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}に殺されるべく見捨てられた時、これ以上帝国の言いなりになるのはやめようと決意しました。コミッサーを死ぬまで殴打し、我が部隊に降参するように説得しました。その結果、ここに流れつきました」

languages.text: «Cuando nos abandonaron a nuestra suerte a manos de los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, decidí que ya había tragado bastante mierda del Imperium. Maté a nuestro Comisario a palazos y convencí a mi unidad para que nos rindiéramos. Y así acabé aquí».
languages.original_text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando nos abandonaron a nuestra suerte a manos de los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, decidí que ya había tragado bastante mierda del Imperium. Maté a nuestro Comisario a palazos y convencí a mi unidad para que nos rindiéramos. Y así acabé aquí».

languages.original_text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the Drukhari, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

languages.text: « Quand ils nous ont laissés mourir aux mains des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, j'ai décidé que j'en avais assez de manger dans la main de l'Imperium, surtout qu'ils ne me servaient que de la merde. J'ai tabassé notre commissaire à mort et convaincu mon unité de se rendre. C'est comme ça que j'ai fini ici. »
languages.original_text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

traits.locale_text: « Quand ils nous ont laissés mourir aux mains des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, j'ai décidé que j'en avais assez de manger dans la main de l'Imperium, surtout qu'ils ne me servaient que de la merde. J'ai tabassé notre commissaire à mort et convaincu mon unité de se rendre. C'est comme ça que j'ai fini ici. »

languages.text: "Als sie uns in den Klauen der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} zum Sterben zurückließen, beschloss ich, dass ich genügend Mist aus der Hand des Imperiums gefressen hatte. Ich erschlug unseren Kommissar und überredete meine Einheit zur Aufgabe. Und so bin ich hier gelandet."
languages.original_text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

traits.locale_text: "Als sie uns in den Klauen der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} zum Sterben zurückließen, beschloss ich, dass ich genügend Mist aus der Hand des Imperiums gefressen hatte. Ich erschlug unseren Kommissar und überredete meine Einheit zur Aufgabe. Und so bin ich hier gelandet."

languages.text: "Bizi {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharilerin{/g} ellerinde ölmeye terk ettiklerinde, İmparatorluk'un zırvalarına daha fazla tahammül etmemeye karar verdim. Komiserimizi döverek öldürdüm ve birimimi teslim olmaları için ikna ettim. Kendimi bu şekilde burada buldum."
languages.original_text: "When they left us to die at the hands of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, I decided I'd eaten enough crap out of the Imperium's hand. I beat our Commissar to death and convinced my unit to surrender. And that's how I ended up here."

traits.locale_text: "Bizi {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}lerin ellerinde ölmeye terk ettiklerinde, İmparatorluk'un zırvalarına daha fazla tahammül etmemeye karar verdim. Komiser'imizi döverek öldürdüm ve birimimi teslim olmaları için ikna ettim. Kendimi bu şekilde burada buldum."
